comments.text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:8.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/8.0.1
Build ID: 20111120135848

Steps to reproduce:

Click on "New Plan" or "New Case".


Actual results:

I get a following message: "You do not have sufficient rights to create new Test Plans" or "You do not have sufficient rights to create new Test Cases".
comments.author: tomoya11@mail.ru
comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:8.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/8.0.1
Build ID: 20111120135848

Steps to reproduce:

Click on "New Plan" or "New Case".


Actual results:

I get a following message: "You do not have sufficient rights to create new Test Plans" or "You do not have sufficient rights to create new Test Cases".

comments.text: I agree that if you don't have rights to create a new plan or a new case, the corresponding links should be not displayed.
comments.author: LpSolit@gmail.com
